title: Julius Caesar
subtle:
Biography (nonfiction), 2,124 words, Level Z2 (Grade 5+), Lexile 1110L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     S and Y
description: Through political maneuvering, adept military strategy, and impressive leadership, Gaius Julius Caesar would become one of the most influential leaders in the ancient world. Readers will be fascinated by the story of a man whose name became synonymous with emperor.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
